name: part_007
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021】3DLIVE⧸ゲスト大勢！重大告知もりもり！【ホロライブ】 [dVlNi7Pby0w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine introduces her birthday live stream on a virtual beach, mentioning guests and a special medley.
Shirakami Fubuki joins Houshou Marine for a duet performance of the song 'Happiness World'.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: っていうことで、ラヴいひと時を...
subtitles.english: So, for a lovely moment...

subtitles.original: はい！っていうことで皆様、どうもどうも
subtitles.english: Hi! So everyone, thank you, thank you

subtitles.original: 船長の誕生日ライブに来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: for coming to the Captain's birthday live!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: はい今日はですね、宝鐘マリン
subtitles.english: Yes, today, Houshou Marine,

subtitles.original: #宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021でいっぱい呟いてください。
subtitles.english: please tweet a lot with #HoushouMarineBirthday2021.

subtitles.original: いっぱいスクショとかしてくださいね。感想待ってます。
subtitles.english: Please take lots of screenshots too. I'm waiting for your impressions.

subtitles.original: 今日はですね、この後はもう怒涛の
subtitles.english: Today, after this, we have an overwhelming

subtitles.original: 超超ゲストメドレー！いっぱいゲストが来ますので、
subtitles.english: super-super guest medley! Many guests will come,

subtitles.original: もうどんな曲を誰とどの曲をやるのかちょっとワクワクしながら見ていてくださいね。
subtitles.english: so please look forward to who will perform what song together while you watch.

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひいっぱいどしどし呟いてください。
subtitles.english: Please, please, tweet a lot, more and more.

subtitles.original: うわ！誕生日だ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Whoa! It's my birthday! Yay!

subtitles.original: それじゃあゲストパートいきますよ。
subtitles.english: Well then, let's go to the guest part.

subtitles.original: 出航！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Setting sail! Yay!

subtitles.original:
Happiness World
宝鐘マリン・白上フブキ
Houshou Marine Birthday 3D Live
subtitles.english:
Happiness World
Houshou Marine & Shirakami Fubuki
Houshou Marine Birthday 3D Live

subtitles.original: 1, 2, 3, Hey, Yay!
subtitles.english: 1, 2, 3, Hey, Yay!

subtitles.original: ねえそこのお嬢様 ここはパラダイスだよ
subtitles.english: Hey there, young lady. This is paradise.

subtitles.original: 不満げな顔しちゃダメだよダメダメ
subtitles.english: Don't make a dissatisfied face. No, no.

subtitles.original: スマイルがパスポート それがあれば満点
subtitles.english: A smile is your passport. With that, it's perfect.

subtitles.original: 楽しんでいこうよ パラダイスタイム
subtitles.english: Let's have some fun. It's paradise time.

subtitles.original: 鼻歌歌っちゃう 勇気出して
subtitles.english: I'll start humming. Gather your courage.

subtitles.original: 1, 2 step yay
subtitles.english: 1, 2 step yay

subtitles.original: 今までの景色とは 明らかに違う世界
subtitles.english: A world clearly different from the scenery until now.

subtitles.original: フルブーストで 楽しもうよ
subtitles.english: Let's enjoy it with a full boost.

subtitles.original: イマダ ゲッタチャンスだ 夢を掴もう
subtitles.english: Now's the time! Get a chance and grab your dream.

subtitles.original: 明日から 紙吹雪フィーバー
subtitles.english: Starting tomorrow, it's confetti fever.

subtitles.original: 想像したことない出来事が きっと待ってるさ
subtitles.english: Events you've never imagined are surely waiting for you.

subtitles.original: シングアソングで 心躍らせ
subtitles.english: Sing a song and make your heart dance.

subtitles.original: ポジティブに さあ 帆を上げ いっぱい
subtitles.english: Stay positive! Now, raise the sails high.

subtitles.original: 気持ち晴れ渡るその瞬間 全速前進だ
subtitles.english: The moment your feelings clear up, go full speed ahead.

subtitles.original: いつだって 1人じゃない
subtitles.english: You're never alone.

subtitles.original: 私たちと一緒に 最高にハッピーな人生を yay!
subtitles.english: Live a most happy life together with us. Yay!

subtitles.original: 雨降ってイタい 眠い ずっとベッド 出たくない
subtitles.english: It's raining and it hurts. I'm sleepy. I don't want to leave my bed.

subtitles.original: ねむたじゃない 今日は休み なんでSleep my time
subtitles.english: It's not just sleepiness. Today is a day off, so why sleep my time away?

subtitles.original: そういう時はそう 何かやりたいことやってみよう
subtitles.english: In times like that, yes, let's try doing something you want to do.

subtitles.original: 紹介していこう 君の内に秘める野望
subtitles.english: Let's introduce them—the ambitions hidden inside you.

subtitles.original: 思い切り 思い切り 声を出して
subtitles.english: Give it your all, give it your all, shout it out!

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしい気持ちとは 今すぐにバイバイさ
subtitles.english: Say goodbye to those feelings of embarrassment right now.

subtitles.original: エンジン全開 はじけようよ
subtitles.english: Full engine throttle! Let's burst forth.

subtitles.original: 進めよ イマイメだ 立ち止まらずに
subtitles.english: Move forward! It's the 'now' dream, don't stop.

subtitles.original: 未来へと 飛ばせ叫べ コンコン
subtitles.english: Fly toward the future, shout it out! Kon kon.

subtitles.original: 一秒も 無駄にはできないよ
subtitles.english: We can't waste even a single second.

subtitles.original: もっとさらけ出せ
subtitles.english: Show more of yourself.

subtitles.original: It's a party ハイテンションで
subtitles.english: It's a party! With high tension!

subtitles.original: 帆を上げろ お宝出航
subtitles.english: Raise the sails! Setting sail for treasure.

subtitles.original: 後悔したくないその思いが 追い風になる
subtitles.english: That feeling of not wanting to regret will become a tailwind.

subtitles.original: 困ったら 思い出して
subtitles.english: If you're in trouble, remember.

subtitles.original: 私たちがいるから 最高にハッピーな運命を yay!
subtitles.english: Because we are here. A most happy destiny! Yay!

subtitles.original: 目と目でエンジョイタイム
subtitles.english: Eye to eye, it's enjoy time.

subtitles.original: 気分も高まる It's all right
subtitles.english: Your mood will rise too. It's all right.

subtitles.original: バイブスは 最高潮 せーのでみんなで Oh yay!
subtitles.english: The vibes are at their peak. Ready, everyone? Oh yay!

subtitles.original: 両手を挙げましょう 万々歳
subtitles.english: Let's raise our hands. Hurrah!

subtitles.original: まだまだこれでは物足りない
subtitles.english: This is still not enough.

subtitles.original: 内気なそこの君 こっちおいで
subtitles.english: You there, the shy one, come over here.

subtitles.original: 古今東西の老若男女
subtitles.english: Men and women of all ages from all times and places.

subtitles.original: 楽しいことが 一番でしょ
subtitles.english: Fun things are the best, right?

subtitles.original: 少しタガを 外してみましょう
subtitles.english: Let's try cutting loose a little.

subtitles.original: ようこそワンダーランド
subtitles.english: Welcome to wonderland.

subtitles.original: 今日から一歩一歩踏み出せばきっと
subtitles.english: If you start taking steps from today, surely,

subtitles.original: 人生の経験値 ゲット
subtitles.english: you'll get life experience points.

subtitles.original: ふとした何気ないことだって
subtitles.english: Even the most casual things,

subtitles.original: 多分数年 笑えるさ
subtitles.english: you'll probably be able to laugh at in a few years.

subtitles.original: イマダ イマダ ゲッタチャンスだ 夢を掴もう
subtitles.english: Now's the time! Now's the time! Get a chance and grab your dream.

subtitles.original: 明日から 紙吹雪フィーバー
subtitles.english: Starting tomorrow, it's confetti fever.

subtitles.original: 想像したことない出来事が...
subtitles.english: Events you've never imagined...
